Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: De-icing valve stuck in closed position. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Pressurization component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: U - Lapses on the part of User
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 25/03/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
